**Typos**

- [scope](https://google.com) <- replace `scope` by the typo scope (eg: Product Page)
  ```html
  <div>
    Demain c'est Férié
    <div></div>
  </div>
  ```
- [scope](https://google.com) <- replace `scope` by the typo scope (eg: Product Page)
  ```html
  <div>
    Demain c'est Férié
    <div></div>
  </div>
  ```
